Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit in Bangkok (Sukhumvit), you'll be close to Gateway Ekamai Mall and Lumpini Park. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of J Avenue Thonglor and K Village.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 296 guestrooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items) and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Bangkok? This hotel has 5000 square feet (450 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gateway Ekamai Mall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
J Avenue Thonglor - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
K Village - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bangkok University - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Emporium Shopping Complex - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Embassy of Hungary - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Benjasiri Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Stock Exchange of Thailand - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Embassy of Argentina - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Queen Sirikit National Convention Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Embassy of India - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Benjakiti Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Terminal 21 Shopping Mall - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Bangkok Hospital - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Tesco Lotus Sukhumvit 50 - 3 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
